unnormalised: Bharotant sadharan GI somosya ani tancher upay kitem?
normalised: Bharotantlea sadharan G-I sombondit prosn ani tanche upchar kitem?

unnormalised: Thoddench nhoi, Bharat, dusrea khonnchea-i desan bhaxen, apnna gastroenterological somosyancho vantto polleta. Typhoid sarkhea infections, jim sadharanponnan Widal testin nirdharit kortat, te sadharanponnan disun yetat. Upcharan sadharanponnan ciprofloxacin 500mg disak don pautt 7 disank sarkhea antibioticsacho aspav asta, punn sodankaleka doktork mellat. Jhiroi-i sadharan, khas korun pausalleachea vellar. Udok unnem zaunche vishayak chinta asa, ten ORS (Oral Rehydration Solution) zaiuch poddta.
normalised: Borem, her khoinchea-i desabhaxen Bharotantuy gastroenterological vixaiancher boreach prosnanchi zodd zata. Tantuntlea kaim chodd famad aslolea prosnant typhoid sarkhea infectionancho aspavo asta, zaka sadharanponnan Widal testin sid'dh kel'lem asta. Upcharant sadharanponnan antibiotics vaprunk yeta zatunt ciprofloxacin panch xembhor milligram disak don pauti sat disank vaprunk yeta, punn sodankal ek doctorak vicharunk favo. Diarrhea-uy sadharanponnan disun yeta, khas korun pausachea kallant. Dehydration ek vhodd chinta asa, mhunn O-R-S (Oral Rehydration Solution) zai mhunn zai.

unnormalised: Ani ek sadharan problem mhunntlear acidity vo kallzak jollop, zaka zaiten lok tikhat jevnnaak lagun manta. Ranitidine 150mg sarkhea antacids udka-purtem nivaron divnk xakta, punn dhomparan choltolea vishoyank तपासnechi goroz asta, koxe AIIMS sarkhea borea hospitalant endoscopy sarkhea. Irritable Bowel Syndrome (IBS) disun yetalem. Lakshan bodlunk zatat punn potduk dukhn ani todde todke pottleancher khobor zank zatat. Jevnna bodlap ani stress management mukhel, kiteakoi diarrhea-predominant IBS kiteak loperamide HCL 2mg sarkhea medicaments kodden.
normalised: Ani ek sadharan problem mhunnlear acidity vo heartburn, zo boreach zan spicy khanea lagun zata mhunn sangtat. Antacids Ranitidine dexo panch milligram temporary asa, punn sodankal cholun aslolo prosnak sodun kaddunk zai, te bhitor endoscopy A-I-I-M-S sarkhea bore hospitalan korun ghenvchem. Irritable Bowel Syndrome (I-B-S)-uy disun yeta. Symptoms bodlotat punn potdukh ani povali pod'dotinui bodol zatat. Diet bodlun ani stress kam korunk zai, kadachit loperamide H-C-L don milligram diarrhea-prodhani I-B-S aslear vaprunk zata.

unnormalised: Liverche rog, hepatitis A, B ani C poriant, tancho-i motvo asa. Hepatitis A udkak lagun zata, ani vaccination mellta. Hepatitis B ani C gambhir, tanka khas upcharachi goroz asta; interferon injections kiteakoi vaprotat. Hacher soddlear, Gallstones sadharanponnan disun yetat, ani lakshan dixtti poddlear tanka surgerychi goroz poddta – ek laparoscopic cholecystectomy. Ek private hospitalant hem karye korunk Rs. 50,000 te Rs. 1,00,000 poriant khorch yetlo.
normalised: Liverache rog, zatunt hepatitis A, B ani C-cho aspavo asta, tankuy mahatv ditlem zata. Hepatitis A sadharanponnan udkantlean vochot, ani vaccination-uy mellta. Hepatitis B ani C gambhir asat ani tankam khas upcharachi goroz asta; interferonache injections-uy vaprunk yetat. Ani, Gallstones-uy boreach zanank zatat, ani tenka zalea uprant tenka surgery korunk poddtta – laparoscopic cholecystectomy. Hea procedureak private hospitalant rupee ponchas hazarani rupee ek lakh meren khorch yetlo.

unnormalised: Khoreponnan, tem matuch mhunn yad dovrunk zai ki hi fuddakari mahiti asa. Sodik diagnose ani upcharak sodankaleka ek gunvant gastroenterologistik mellat. Svatach medicaments vapurnuk nuksanik poddunk xakta. Tumkam potduk dukhn sarkhea dhomparan choltolea vishayacho onubhav asa zalear, pot vaddonche vo pottleancher bodol zala zalear, tuzo upchar zata mhunn tum medical attention vegimuch gheunchea. Tea sopean suchanank dollo dhonkunakai!
normalised: Nimannem, mhaka ugddas divonk di ki hi samani mahiti. Sodankal zannkar gastroenterologist-ak borench sid'dh korunk ani upchar korunk vicharunk zai. Aapnankuch upchar korop khatronnachem zatolem. Tuvem sodankal disun yetolea potdukhin, futtleponnant, vo povali pod'dotin bodal zatalea vixaiacher laksh divop gorjechem, kripa korun doktorak toront dakhavop. Ti suchnavo dukholona!
